block.p: RICH-Josephine. Retired RN. Graduate of Flushing Hospital School of Nursing. On June 16, 2000. Devoted wife of the late Joseph Rich, M.D., of Flushing Hospital. Cherished mother of Lisa, Victoria, Laura, Lillian, Joseph and Ann Marie. Grandmother of nine. Devoted sister of Martha Palli and John Fiorello. Mass of Christian Burial Tuesday, 9:45 AM at Holy Trinity R.C. Church. Interment Long Island National Cemetery. In lieu of flowers, donations to NYU Medical Center, 316 E. 30 St., NY NY 10016, Attn: Mr. Collier. For further information contact Martin A. Gleason Funeral Home, 718359-6300.
